name: Tireless Pursuers
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a hard biscuit broken into pieces)
text: This spell functions as tireless pursuit, except as noted above.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (摔成碎片的硬饼干)
target_zh: 你加上每3个施法者等级1名接触到的生物
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 除了上述内容以外，该法术如同追人不倦 (tireless pursuit) 一般。
